pages.title: Mutant Skeleton
pages.text: $(br)Naturally spawned $(key)Skeletons$() have a small chance to mutate into a $(key)Mutant Skeleton$().$(br)They can also be spawned manually via $(mage/spell#summon)Mana Summon$() or a $(key)Splash Mutant Potion$().$(br2)Defeating a $(key)Mutant Skeleton$() drops $(key)Mutant Skeleton Skull/Rib Cage/Pelvis$(), which can be used to craft $(boss/t2/graveyard_lich#staff)Ominous Bone Staff Fragments$().
